code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Routes,Route,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{FaClipboardList,FaCalendarAlt}from'react-icons/fa';import ExhibitionManagement from'./components/ExhibitionManagement';import ReservationManagement from'./components/ReservationManagement';import'./AdminPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminPage=()=>{const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('exhibitions');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleTabChange=tab=>{setActiveTab(tab);navigate("/admin/".concat(tab==='exhibitions'?'':tab));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"admin-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u041F\u0430\u043D\u0435\u043B\u044C \u0430\u0434\u043C\u0438\u043D\u0430"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"admin-content section",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"admin-navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"admin-tab ".concat(activeTab==='exhibitions'?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleTabChange('exhibitions'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaCalendarAlt,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\u0412\u044B\u0441\u0442\u0430\u0432\u043A\u0438"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"admin-tab ".concat(activeTab==='reservations'?'active':''),onClick:()=>handleTabChange('reservations'),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FaClipboardList,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\u0411\u0440\u043E\u043D\u0438\u0440\u043E\u0432\u0430\u043D\u0438\u044F"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"admin-panel",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExhibitionManagement,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"reservations",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReservationManagement,{})})]})})]})})]});};export default AdminPage;
